argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x y z

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_difss | |- ( ( _V X. _V ) \ ran ( ( _V (x) _E ) (++) ( ( _E o. `' A ) (x) _V ) ) ) C_ ( _V X. _V ) |
| 2 |  | #P_df-rel | |- ( Rel ( ( _V X. _V ) \ ran ( ( _V (x) _E ) (++) ( ( _E o. `' A ) (x) _V ) ) ) <-> ( ( _V X. _V ) \ ran ( ( _V (x) _E ) (++) ( ( _E o. `' A ) (x) _V ) ) ) C_ ( _V X. _V ) ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_mpbir | |- Rel ( ( _V X. _V ) \ ran ( ( _V (x) _E ) (++) ( ( _E o. `' A ) (x) _V ) ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_df-image | |- Image A = ( ( _V X. _V ) \ ran ( ( _V (x) _E ) (++) ( ( _E o. `' A ) (x) _V ) ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_releqi | |- ( Rel Image A <-> Rel ( ( _V X. _V ) \ ran ( ( _V (x) _E ) (++) ( ( _E o. `' A ) (x) _V ) ) ) ) |
| 6 | 3, 5 | #P_mpbir | |- Rel Image A |
| 7 |  | #P_vex | |- x e. _V |
| 8 |  | #P_vex | |- y e. _V |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_brimage | |- ( x Image A y <-> y = ( A " x ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_vex | |- z e. _V |
| 11 | 7, 10 | #P_brimage | |- ( x Image A z <-> z = ( A " x ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_eqtr3 | |- ( ( y = ( A " x ) /\ z = ( A " x ) ) -> y = z ) |
| 13 | 9, 11, 12 | #P_syl2anb | |- ( ( x Image A y /\ x Image A z ) -> y = z ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_gen2 | |- A. y A. z ( ( x Image A y /\ x Image A z ) -> y = z ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_ax-gen | |- A. x A. y A. z ( ( x Image A y /\ x Image A z ) -> y = z ) |
| 16 |  | #P_dffun2 | |- ( Fun Image A <-> ( Rel Image A /\ A. x A. y A. z ( ( x Image A y /\ x Image A z ) -> y = z ) ) ) |
| 17 | 6, 15, 16 | #P_mpbir2an | |- Fun Image A |
